#summary How to contact me.

== Contacting Me ==

Just enter a comment on this, or any other documentation page. I should be notified about the comment by e-mail, and I will respond on this same page.

If you need a more secure communication, you should be able to find my e-mail address by clicking on my user name in my profile [http://code.google.com/p/story-steward/people/list here] and filling out the appropriate captchas. You can also send me a message through my [http://townsedgetechnology.com/contact web contact form].
